contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox cricket team | county = Zimbabwe | image = [[File:Flag of Zimbabwe.svg|250px]] | oneday = | secondteam = | coach = Walter Chawaguta | bowlingcoach = | fieldingcoach = | captain = [[Sean Williams (cricketer)|Sean Williams]] | odcaptain = | overseas = | colors = | founded = | ground = | capacity = | owner = | ceo = | manager = Dilip Chouhan | adviser = | fcdebutvs = | fcdebutyr = | fcdebutvenue = | website = }} The '''Zimbabwe Under-19 cricket team''' represents the Zimbabwe in [[Under-19]] [[cricket]] at the international level. Their most recent match was against [[Sri Lanka Under-19 cricket team|Sri Lanka]] at [[R. Premadasa Stadium]], [[Colombo]], 16 February 2006.<ref>[http://www.icc-cricket.com/icc/events/u19worldcup/2006/squads/zim.html ICC U-19 Cricket World Cup]</ref> ==Squad== The Under-19 team for [[Zimbabwe]], which played in [[2006 ICC Under-19 Cricket World Cup]], is as follows: *[[Sean Williams (cricketer)|Sean Williams]] [Captain] *[[Gary Balance]] *[[Ronald Benade]] *[[Justice Chibhabha]] *[[Graeme Cremer]] *[[Ryan Higgins]] *[[Friday Kasteni]] *[[Tarisai Mahlunge]] *[[Prince Masvaure]] *[[Keegan Meth]] *[[Taurai Tapfumaneyi]] *[[Ian Nicolson]] *[[Donald Samunderu]] *[[Glen Querl]] ==References== {{reflist}} {{African under-19 cricket teams}} [[Category:Under-19 cricket teams]] {{Zimbabwe-sport-stub}} {{cricket-team-stub}}
